mapper.update: UPDATE calendar c JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as completed_missions FROM mission WHERE mission_check = true GROUP BY user_id ) m ON c.user_id = m.user_id SET c.day${day} = m.completed_missions;
